#Text=Young Zuko says : " I want to go into the war chamber but the guard wo n't let me pass ! "
#Text=Iroh says : " You 're not missing anything , trust me .

#Text= Young Zuko says : " If I 'm going to rule this nation one day , do n't you think I need to start learning as much as I can ?

column1: #Text=" Iroh says : " Very well .
#Text=But you must promise not to speak .
#Text=These old folks are a bit sensitive , you know ?
#Text=" Young Zuko says : " Thank you , Uncle .
#Text=" Bujing says : " The Earth Kingdom defenses are concentrated here .
#Text=A dangerous battalion of their strongest earthbenders and fiercest warriors .
#Text=So I am recommending the forty - first division .
#Text=" Elder soldier says : " But the forty - first is entirely new recruits .
#Text=How do you expect them to defeat a powerful Earth Kingdom battalion ?
#Text=" Bujing says : " I do n't .
#Text=They 'll be used as a distraction while we mount an attack from the rear .
#Text=What better to use as bait than fresh meat ?
#Text=" Young Zuko says : " You ca n't sacrifice an entire division like that !
#Text=Those soldiers love and defend our nation !
#Text=How can you betray them ?
#Text="
